title: Ep180 Texas Tea Transgressions (Houston LIVE)
description: This week, the gals grow out their prospector mustaches and mine for some oily infractions. Topics include the dangers of refintery sites, a VERY greasy attorney, and an ice-cold grandpa with seriously tight purse strings. Dip into a bottle of Aquilo Pinot Noir, stock up on Dawn, and tune in for Texas Tea Transgressions (Live from Houston)! For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
